subject: Didn't know I had this one.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Looking for something in the workroom and found this. Already had it
modified for manual operation, but don't rmember when, or where it came
from. It has a built in amp(speaker driver), so for a baisc box just needs
sweep, and I added line out for a recorder. I might not have used it because
of the weird band switch, so I found a way to use it as is.

 F-S

 F-S
